citation: Get to Know Director Hill page – biography of Jay Hill
administering_body: Division of Aging, Adult, and Behavioral Health Services (DAABHS)
effects: Jay Hill serves as the director of DAABHS. He oversees programs that promote the health, safety and independence of older Arkansans and adults with disabilities. Hill began working at DHS at the Arkansas Health Center in 2006, became its director in 2011 and accepted his current position in 2017【56897009336872†L871-L878】.
